document_data.name: Ghost Street
document_data.ends: The wall of the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Ghost Street''' was a small road located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Ghost Street was located in northeast Zhentil Keep in the [[Zhentil Keep/Common Quarter|Common Quarter]]. Originating along [[Fortress Street]], Ghost Street passed south for just {{SI|300|ft|long=yes}} before ending at a gate leading into the [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]]. [[Electrum Avenue]] connected with the southwest side of Ghost Street.
document_data.Notable Locations: A warehouse used exclusively by the [[Zhentarim]] was located on Ghost Street.
